Class StatisticsContainer

java.lang.Object
Skeleton.StatisticsContainer
public class StatisticsContainer extends Object
Singleton object for all statistics. At this level, we have one set of Skeleton.Statistics for each Skeleton.Unit. The name of the object is the key used here in the HashMap.
